participant_1.background:
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
i made my first movie when i was 18.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
my favorite band is bon over.
i was born completely deaf.

participant_2.background:
I listen to the Beatles to lift my spirits.
I drink far too much soda, which is not good for my health.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.
my family is very important to me.
i love animals and i want to help them.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks for asking. I am a huge fan of the Beatles. What is your favorite song by them?
I like a lot of their songs, but my favorite is probably "Let it Be." What about you?
That is a good choice. My favorite is "Here Comes the Sun." I love the optimistic and happy feel of the song.
I can see why you like that song. It is very upbeat and positive.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to music, reading, and spending time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies. I like to archery and I am also a big fan of LARP.
I have never heard of LARP before. What is it?
It is a live-action role-playing game. People dress up as characters and pretend to be in a fantasy world. It is a lot of fun and can be very social.
That sounds really interesting. I would love to try it sometime.
I would be happy to show you how to play.
Thank you. I would love that.
